attributes.action: Hold referendum on EU exit plan when you have a plan with its impact detailed
attributes.additional_details:
Sky News Political Editor Faisal Islam spoke to a Tory MP from the Vote Leave campaign and his take on Britain’s future post-Brexit was quite something.

Faisal Islam asked: ‘So where’s the plan, can we see the Brexit plan now?’

Islam quoted the MP as saying: ‘There is no plan. The Leave campaign don’t have a post-Brexit plan’.

Video here:
http://metro.co.uk/2016/06/26/revealed-vote-leaves-exit-plan-after-eu-referendum-5968106/
attributes.background:
A plan detailing how these will work
-Tariff free access to EU for UK products & services
-Immigration
-Extra £350M/week for NHS
-Law changes,eg employment rights
-Farm,regional & EU subsidies
-Rights to work in EU
-EU Travel
-Rights for UK citizens in EU & EU citizens in UK
-Irish border
